title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Chicago Med Very Nonchalantly Brings Back [Spoiler] After 5 Seasons — Plus, Hannah Gets Shocking News!
description: The funeral of Dr. Charles’ mother on Chicago Med brought about the unexpected return of a character that viewers haven’t seen in five seasons. During Wednesday’s episode, the psychiatrist was greeted by his daughter Anna (played by Hannah Riley), and she wasn’t alone: Dr. Charles’ other daughter, Robin (Mekia Cox), was also in attendance! It’s […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Casting News: Bergeron Is Dancing Again, Minnie Driver Visits Emily in Paris and More
description: Tom Bergeron will emcee a very different kind of dance floor for Discovery’s Dancing With Sharks (working title). The Dancing With the Stars vet is set to host the aforementioned Shark Week 2025 special, in which expert divers and their shark partners compete in underwater dances. “Blending skill, grace and the daring pursuit of the […]
author: Vlada Gelman
